column4: If I Select "Allow Remote System Administrator Login" under the Login Windows Preferences, does that mean that if I am connected to that system by remote desktop and I reboot the system I will be able to log back in by using the Remote Desktop?
throw up ettercap and sniff their passwords

Do you know this for sure, I would like to reboot or at least log out log back into the remote system but if It doesn't work I wont be able to access it until Saturday night when I physically go to the computer
